name: Seperation Dungeon
description:
Recommended to play in full screen

Made for Gdevelop #3 game jam.

Liluo link: https://liluo.io/sulex00/separation-dungeon

A game where you a trapped in a dungeon and must survive to exit.

Controls:

Space to Dash in 6 directions (up, left, down, right, and diagonally)

WASD to move

Click or Hold Left Mouse Button to shoot.
